name: Island Build Masters
description:
A near future. People and robots live side by side with each other. In schools no longer sit at school desks, but learn all crafts in practice.
In this game you will take on the role of a graduater of the future school, whose goal is to build an amusement park on a Paradise Island. But not everything is so simple!

To do this, you need to earn enough money and resources, collect items, build a city and reach level 1, which will open the building! In the game, you can also pass quests, find chests with treasures of the Island, buy, collect and build items of improvement, hire mercenaries, etc.!

Find the most interesting lesson for yourself in the newest indie game Island Build Masters!
